# Data Source (pfptmeta_device_alias)

DNS alias (FQDN) of the device.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "pfptmeta_device_alias" "alias" {
  device_id = "dev-123"
  alias     = "test.com"
}

output "alias" {
  value = data.pfptmeta_device_alias.alias
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `alias` (String)
- `device_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
